insert.description: event send when a document is inserted in a collection

update.description: event send when a document is updated in a collection

remove.description: event send when a document is removed from a collection

collection.description: id of the collection where a document has been updated

id.description: id of the document that has been updated

field.description: field of the document that has been updated

value.description: value of the field of the document that has been updated

collection.description: id of the collection where a document has been removed

id.description: id of the document that has been removed

collection.description: id of the collection where a document has been inserted
